Reviews.Content: It works well. I didn't like the big one. It kept falling and it would scare me lol. So I bought another one of the little ones to replace it. Overall a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my neighbor.  I already had one and like it so now she has one too.  It helps

Reviews.Title: brill product highly recomended
Reviews.Author: jason higgins
Reviews.Content: good product buy it very secure well worth the money i suggest people buy this product it a reliable intruder deterint.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: waverunner
Reviews.Content: Was cheap, alarm is loud enough, easy to use. It's not perfect but didn't expect that for $20. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: VERY LOUD!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Romero
Reviews.Content: THey work as they should and are very loud, which is awesome. I have them all around my apt. Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Anuj Sharma
Reviews.Content: It is quiet loud indeed.Once we forgot to enter the code, and it almost knocked me out. For some reason, entering the code didn't silence it in first attempt. But it worked later. I like the away mode - simple to use and fits my requirement precisely.The chime mode could have been little less loud or adjustable perhaps.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Robert J Hadley
Reviews.Content: So easy to install, Setting up alarm took a couple of tries but now it's great  one idea add a few more adhesive tapes

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: suzanne1
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend any one to get this for home security!  Its perfect to secure the home! I feel much better about leaving the house!

Reviews.Title: Good one!
Reviews.Author: Pam Billings
Reviews.Content: Nice to have a chime on the 3 doors we have in the country. We know when the other has come in or out to the yard/pool . The alarm part have only been activated by us and it will ring your bell......so I expect it would do the same to a thief.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and fast delivery. Just what I needed. Very simple instructions. Would purchase again. Works just the way I wanted

Reviews.Title: more detailed description needed
Reviews.Author: delirious
Reviews.Content: Product is cheaply made. They each need 4 or 5 tiny batteries. I'm sure the batteries will be expensive once they run out. Thats 20 - 25 batteries needed when time to be replaced.Thought that the main unit was able to view which alarms were being triggered and silence them from a distance if need be. Wanted this for the garage so I can hear in my house if one of the alarms were set off outside. Each alarm has its own alarm speaker. Details about the item could have been a littler more specific.

Reviews.Title: loud alarm
Reviews.Author: Mikecam
Reviews.Content: if you install these alarms the way the directions tell you they work great, the door chime is fairly loud and the alarm is very loud.they work perfect.

Reviews.Title: good ,easy
Reviews.Author: Min
Reviews.Content: excellent ,affordable for everyone,I like this item for me and my customer ,You will like it very much for always

Reviews.Title: Good if you have kids! :)
Reviews.Author: Jam02ary
Reviews.Content: It is a good price for the set. Also, we saved like 13% on our home owner's insurance for getting it!! Woo Hoo. The "chime" setting is good if you have kids, because it just does a loud chime whenever the door opens! (That way they can't "sneak" out - toddlers!) The Alarm is VERY loud and annoying! Just like an alarm should be, lol.

Reviews.Title: okay product
Reviews.Author: KRobinson
Reviews.Content: this was an okay product and purchase not quite what I expected but it worked for the time being, when we moved the window parts wouldn't come off the window it actually broke the window when we tried to take it off

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive way to keep someone out
Reviews.Author: silverlady2
Reviews.Content: It's a good deterrent for use when wanting to keep someone out of some place because the alarm is so startling when it goes off and you are not expecting it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent option!
Reviews.Author: pamela Isner
Reviews.Content: Super simple to install and use- I recommend buying just one to see if it fits on your door jamb. It does not fit one of my doors, but I am ordering 2 more today for the other doors it will fit. The alarm is LOUD- which is great.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Skyelady "skyeladytoo"
Reviews.Content: Really good, inexpensive alarm system. It was very easy to install, I did it myself ( my late husband always said I was screwdriver challenged) so anyone can put this in. Loud alarm.

Reviews.Title: Smart Choice!!!
Reviews.Author: Antonio J Rosario Rivera
Reviews.Content: Great alarm !! Excellent price and loud enough to wake up the neighbors. Easy to install and batteries are include for the small ones!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: A. Raines
Reviews.Content: I have these all over the house so that I don't sleep through an intruder coming in during the middle of the night.

Reviews.Title: Good basic starter set
Reviews.Author: D. P. Williams
Reviews.Content: This set is a quick and easy to install system.  More than one needs to be ordered, obviously, for adequate coverage.  The window unit alarm are not loud enough unless you are in the room and they se button batteries which are expensive.

Reviews.Title: Feeling at ease
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: After installing the GE 51107 I feel a little more at ease in my home and can rest more comfortable at night. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Very loud!
Reviews.Author: Frency
Reviews.Content: SO LOUD!!!!! I bought this alarm because living in a townhouse i didn't feel super safe sleeping without an alarm, even if it's a super quite neighborhood you never know.... With this I feel a lot more comfortable and being so affordable I would suggest it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Not too bad for the price,.. and it is very LOUD !!!
Reviews.Author: A. Silvio "Mr Conehead"
Reviews.Content: Not too bad for the price,.. and it is very LOUD !!! Which is what you want.  Purchased for a family member that has Alzheimer's.  Set up is very simple, but product is fairly cheap.  Hardware is cheap you may want to have your own screws available that won't strip out !

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: kikin49
Reviews.Content: I have a shed where I have thousands of dollars of fishing equipment.  I have extended my home alarm to the shed but I wanted there to be an audible alarm in the shed as well and these served the purpose perfectly.

Reviews.Title: ge 51196 Smart Home Wirekess Alarm System Kit
Reviews.Author: Flossie K. Crowe
Reviews.Content: So easy to install.  Easy to access and just what I was looking for to make me more secure at my home.

Reviews.Title: So far, doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: I still have hopes that a smarter friend will be able to install these and get them to work.  So far, I can't.  The large one won't work with my doors..........the door molding gets in the way.  The smaller ones might work on the windows but the metal frame on my windows are so small the little unit won't attach.  The little ones yelp like crazy in my hand but I can't get the large one to sound out when it's supposed to.....even in my hand.  Rats.  I hate sending things back.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Lisamarie Fusco
Reviews.Content: great for the money and really a cool little idea for safety and ease of use.i have to fill this space

Reviews.Title: Wish you could turn off the chime on the door unit
Reviews.Author: ALM
Reviews.Content: I wasn't bothered by the reviews that said the alarm was very loud.  I wanted a loud alarm.  My problem is with the chime that goes off every time I opened the door.  It was so loud it scared the pee right out of my dog.  She refused to go out the door on her own power for two days after I removed the alarm.  I really wish there was a way to turn off the chime.  As it stands it is completely useless to me.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Alarm
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: You get what you see. Good improvised alarm system if you can't get a connected one. Motion sensros work well, jus be mindful of your door frame and how the sensor and mount need to be close together.

Reviews.Title: Just saved my house
Reviews.Author: Jessica Patterson
Reviews.Content: Installation:- The small alarms are super easy as they can be installed with a simple double sided sticky mounting tape. The larger ones however are supposed to be removable and are sent with screws for the back plate, but since my door is metal I had a little trouble mounting them.Use:- They are really quite easy to program and after a few times my wife got used to it. I found the "Away" setting (30 second delay) to be the most useful for our entry door as the other setting "home" (no delay) would often cause the alarm to go off to my wife's chagrin.Effectiveness:- The large alarms are piercing. The small alarms are quite loud and annoying. Likely prevented a burglary at my house 1 night ago (door kicked and bent which made the alarm sound - no entry).I did have some peace of mind after installing the alarms the only thing is you have to remember to turn them on for them to be effective at deterring burglaries.

Reviews.Title: Returned It
Reviews.Author: DLL
Reviews.Content: I returned the item, and I completely forget why.  But I don't return something if I don't like it.  I have found better alternatives to home security.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Gives us a piece of mind with our 3 yo and works great. Loud, easy to install, easy to operate.I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: ULA
Reviews.Content: This alarm set, its very practical, functional and easy to install them. Very complete and they sound very loud.I recomended them!

Reviews.Title: No consistency
Reviews.Author: Scrum
Reviews.Content: When it works it is fine. But it is very hit and miss and two of the units did not work at all! I put it down as a nice looking unit with severe operational flaws!

Reviews.Title: Awesome security for the price, must for apartments.
Reviews.Author: LordMaul
Reviews.Content: As many people have mentioned they don't communicate with each other.  So, yes, punching the code in does not disable the window alarms, but what do you expect at this price point.The door alarm is loud, deafening loud.  The windows units are easily defeatable because there is a switch on the exterior of the unit to shut the alarm off.  But it will still sound itself off before someone can defeat it and that is if they know that it has an exterior switch.it is an absolute must for an apartment complex which doesn't allow the more expensive wiring for 24 hour monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: Challenger R/T
Reviews.Content: Easy to install,door alarm is loud but window alarms are not,I may not hear them go off if someone broke in, for the most part This is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Useful all over the home!
Reviews.Author: Tina S. Barnett "Rosa"
Reviews.Content: Use the main alarm at the entrance door and two of the smaller alarms at the less used doors. Have grandchildren and just like that I can set it to make tone noise as door is opened so that don't slip outside accidentally without me. Easy set up and happy with product.

Reviews.Title: No need to pay a monthly fee for this
Reviews.Author: Nene
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It's just like any other wireless alarm system. The only difference is you don't  need to pay a monthly fee of $30 or more.  You can punch your code to arm and unarmed it.  It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good product great price
Reviews.Author: quentin E cox
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup works very well discreet I would buy more if I needed them. Don't know what else to say

Reviews.Title: So far feel better sleep in order
Reviews.Author: Nemesis Rising
Reviews.Content: This helps you if you can't install a more permanent solution. And omg is it loud the base unit will wake the neighbors while the window alarms will wake you. Put them on doors for added protection. Very fast shipping great product!

Reviews.Title: Safety first
Reviews.Author: Nadine
Reviews.Content: I feel so much safer now. It is really loud; what I like because you can hear from farther away when I open the door that I have an alarm. I just hope this keeps burglars away.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but you don't need the keypad
Reviews.Author: rmrich00
Reviews.Content: I like the little alarms for spare doors/windows, but the keypad was a hassle.  I never could get it to work right.  I would suggest just buying the small, window sensors.

Reviews.Title: Grat for "wanderers"
Reviews.Author: jiffy53
Reviews.Content: I do home safety upgrades and repairs for older adults. When one spouse has dementia and is prone to "wander", these alarms can alert family members quickly when doors are opened. Also can be used for alert when young children try to get out unseen.

Reviews.Title: Does the job I need it to do
Reviews.Author: Donald Cruz
Reviews.Content: The system works and is fairly easy to install.  It adds a level of security to my home for a very low price. Build quality is what you would expect for its price but is fairly decent.  Good product.

Reviews.Title: Home wireless system
Reviews.Author: Derrick L. Petitfils
Reviews.Content: This works as stated. Goes up well on the front door. Looks a little cheap. I know a pro would disable it immediately. But it would keep most local scumbags away.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Apartment
Reviews.Author: Laura S "Laura S"
Reviews.Content: This works great for the apartment and gives us a sense of security when we are away and even at home!

Reviews.Title: Safety & ease
Reviews.Author: A. Winesett "Mom"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, and made my folks feel MUCH better about safety in this small neighborhood.They're pleased with the loudness of the door alarms, but we all feel the window alarms should have more volume.

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: John Hellman
Reviews.Content: PROS:  Strong reviews (multiple sources), small (unobtrusive on the eyes in a room), easy to install, low cost, fast delivery.  Read that sound is very loud/effective.  Haven't tested it out yet, so don't know.  Hard to beat for this price.CONS:  None yet (pre-tested, still).  Only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I haven't tested it out yet.  But that's coming right up!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Ashley Shumard
Reviews.Content: They were easy to install and loud enough to be heard anywhere  in the house.  They do the job at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Wish the door alarm actually works
Reviews.Author: Jaykay
Reviews.Content: The door alarm doesn't work.It chimes when I hold it together but once it's mounted, it's just as good as a door decoration.The window alarms work well and they are loud enough for my two bedrooms apartment.

Reviews.Title: Used to keep kids in
Reviews.Author: clother diaper momma
Reviews.Content: Our kids are now old enough to unlock doors and run out, but too young to do so safely.  We installed these up high on the doors so they cannot reach them, and they go off as a warning signal that they are trying to make a run for it.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: lisa jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my niece for whom lives in an apt. complex that has had a series of break ins.  She loves the added security this brings.

Reviews.Title: Door Alarm
Reviews.Author: Joe Pacheco
Reviews.Content: The Door alarm unit works great. unfortunately  the window sensor batteries don't last worth a hill of beans but they work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn A. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: As neighborhoods become more dangerous this is an effective and easy to install product to ward off ne'er-do-wells. The sticky tape provided is all you need for installation and the window alarms can be used for doors as well

Reviews.Title: Good affordable system.
Reviews.Author: RL Smith
Reviews.Content: Helps with keeping your family safe by alerting you of uninvited guests coming into your abode by unconventional means.Recommended because these affordable items can save the lives of your family by allowing reaction time.

Reviews.Title: Good and handy for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Saurabh Joseph
Reviews.Content: Works well and with my limited usage time this is a good buy for its price. I did have the alarm ringing on one occasion which seemed to be a false alarm though. We couldnt figure out what actually happened but the door was secured and thus it was most likely a false alarm.If you need to use it for short durations as a low cost stop gap, good enough!

Reviews.Title: Feel at ease!
Reviews.Author: D. Younis "DY"
Reviews.Content: These are extremely easy to install and VERY loud. These come ready to install and no programming necessary. I feel at ease after installing these alarm units.

Reviews.Title: Works great for the money
Reviews.Author: Zolja boy
Reviews.Content: Really neat little item. Got a second one for the back door.  So far... no issues and works great. Am planning on buying another one for our RV.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great product.
Reviews.Author: Marie G. Maroney "Molly Woonsocket"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this set after getting the one door alarm...the product is loud, perfect, as a disabled woman living alone I sleep much more soundly now. My neighbor had me order her the same set and another one wants one also. Very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Not a system
Reviews.Author: Nathan Williams
Reviews.Content: All pieces function separately. The three non-keypad parts just have a switch on the side for off, chime, or alarm.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS AWESOME
Reviews.Author: RED "REDD"
Reviews.Content: ONE OF MY PROPERTIES WAS RECENTLY BROKEN INTO, A FRIEND TOLD ME ABOUT THIS PRODUCT AND I IMMEDIATELY PURCHASED IT TO DETER INTRUDERS UNTIL AN ALARM CAN BE INSTALLED. COOL DEAL! I DIDNT EVEN KNOW OF A PRODUCT LIKE THIS.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Amaisa24
Reviews.Content: This wireless alarm is easy to install and it works great. Once you choose your code, you enter it which arms it prior to leaving home. When you return and open the door, the light blinks giving you a few seconds to enter your code and disarm it. If the code is not entered, the Sirens go on and they are super loud.  Simple, wireless, effective and inexpensive Security System for every entry point in your home :)

Reviews.Title: great little alarm system
Reviews.Author: wayne peak
Reviews.Content: inexpensive, easy to use, i love it! i would recommend it to anyone. try it you will love it. believe me.

Reviews.Title: System Works
Reviews.Author: notequal
Reviews.Content: The units make noise if doors/windows are opened.  Its an inexpensive way to give you an additional chance of knowing if someone has entered the house so you can call 911.  I liked the first door unit enough to buy more than one kit to cover several doors/windows.  I may add a motion sensor that sets off a remote alarm as another line of defense, and perhaps more.  Multiple lines of defense are good.The door units have to be screwed into the door, if you plan to use the keypad a lot.  Each time you enter a number into the keypad, the tape is stretched.  After awhile, this unsticks the tape, and the unit will fall off of the door.  The included screws work well for door installation.  The tape is good enough for windows.

Reviews.Title: Great package for the money.
Reviews.Author: renovatio
Reviews.Content: Simple and effective. Have had it installed for just over a month now so not sure about battery life yet, but it works great. If you don't want to pay a monthly subscription or spend $400 on a security system, buy this. It works.

Reviews.Title: Works well, very loud alarm!
Reviews.Author: rebelmom
Reviews.Content: Works as described, set up of keypad and install were easy. Would have given 5 stars but one of the three window units would not function, even with new battery. Bought for use in daughter's college apartment and it's very loud when tested. Good purchase.

Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: Oaklander
Reviews.Content: the wireless alarm is very loud and easy to set up. obviously not as good as an alarm that will contact police or a service. but it's a good deterrent. i do wonder what would happen if a burglar stomped on the thing though.

Reviews.Title: Does what is says
Reviews.Author: Capnjack "Capnjack"
Reviews.Content: Easy install. Door alarm will shatter your eardrums if you have to listen to it too long :) I feel much safer with these on our doors.

Reviews.Title: Provides a Sense of Security
Reviews.Author: shopnredrobn
Reviews.Content: After a recent security incident, we decided to purchase this alarm system.  Hopefully, there is never a need for it again but it does provide a sense of security and protection.

Reviews.Title: Alarm system
Reviews.Author: Cecelia M. Clover
Reviews.Content: Wow. So easy to install.  Perfect numer of alarms for downstairs which is where it is needed. Nice system. Buy it

Reviews.Title: I love the door alarm.
Reviews.Author: K. Bailey
Reviews.Content: I am half deaf (only able to hear in one ear due to childhood ear infections destroying the inner ear of my right ear) so sleeping at night with two small kids in the home gave me severe anxiety. If I was laying on my left ear I was worried I wouldn't hear if someone was in the house. I have been working to overcome the fear but I soon realized I needed some sense of security. Does this alarm call the cops? no. But will it kill your ears if you set it off? Definitely. I can sleep soundly at night knowing there is no way I can mistake a squirrel on the roof as an intruder now. I installed this system in about 10 minutes and have slept better in the past two nights than I have in probably a year. I have not tried the window alarm as of this writing only the door alarm itself.

Reviews.Title: Nice alarm, bit unhappy
Reviews.Author: Courtney J. Walsh "CJ Walsh"
Reviews.Content: I got these right before we moved in to our new place not realizing there would be an issue. Our doors and windows do not sit flush with the wall next to it. I still have not installed this since I need to figure out a way to put something behind it so that everything sits at the right level. Every time I try the dam thing goes off and gives me a migraine; even 'chime' is very loud, good enough for  a large store.I recommend this if you are looking for a cheap alarm system, as compared to ADT. This will work for us and I hope to use it soon.I bought this specifically since I stay home alone all day and my dog is with my parents right now. I'm not afraid of being alone per say, but I do not trust my new area yet since I live on such a high traffic road in a very large apt complex. This alarm will give my enough time to pull out my gun (whenever I end up buying one) and be ready for the intruder, keeping in mind that anyone who still breaks in after hearing this insanely loud alarm is plane old stupid. There's a setting for home and away but honestly I have not tried messing with it since my neighbors are jumpy and come down right away when they hear it; which I guess is good lol. Just wish it comes with how to install with doors/windows like mine.

Reviews.Title: These are great!
Reviews.Author: lwells
Reviews.Content: I have a toddler that likes to go outside, so i wanted to get somthing that would let us know if she opened the door. The chime is loud and works perfect. The alarm is much louder than i thought it would be but i do think if someone was trying to break in it would deter them. Im going to buy another set to put on my back door and the rest of our windows.

Reviews.Title: makes a good door chime only
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: there is only the instructions printed on back of unit for set up. The key pad does not turn the unit off at all. very cheap mounting tape. the screws are of low quality metal that shear off when you try and screw them in.  anyone can come in and turn off unit by flipping off switches on either door switches or main unit.  not very good ...don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Jackson
Reviews.Content: A great affordable way to sleep well at night. I have one on my front door and it is really loud

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: Rashid C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this to make my wife feel a little safer. The main thing I enjoy is the door chime.

Reviews.Title: Missing mounting bracket in my set...:(
Reviews.Author: Brian Griffiths
Reviews.Content: I would give this a 5 star for quality and purpose if my set came with the mounting bracket that was apparently missing.  So now I'm left to figure out how to glue or somehow put my door alarm in spot safely....lame

Reviews.Title: Minimalist peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Fudge
Reviews.Content: I'm a heavy sleeper and like the peace of mind these devices give me. I could sleep through a thud or possible crash of someone breaking in. But, these are loud and obnoxious and I doubt I or my wife would sleep through their annoying screeching. Certainly not as good as an active alarm system that alerts the police for you, but two of these kits cost as much as one months bill to one of those companies. As a supplement to those types of systems, or a cheap heads up to trouble these work great. Once rattled awake make sure a good defensive firearm is close at hand. Though for real away protection a monthly bill is inevitable. Plus, I would also mention a dog might be a better alternative if you don't mind a poop on the carpet occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Julian Garcia
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this kit all I wanted was something that would make a little noise if a window or door opened, enough noise for my dogs to take notice. The alarms are very loud, certainly loud enough to wake me, my family and our dogs from our sleep. This product is worth the price. We sleep a little easier knowing these are installed in our home.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: James C.
Reviews.Content: These alarms are extremely loud.  Easy to install.  Only issue I had was the screw heads strip very easily.  I felt that the screws are made with a cheap metal.  Alarms themselves are great.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I thought it was good for the price Did the job but the delay when the Alarm is triggered is to long.

Reviews.Title: GE 51107 Smart Home Wireless Alarm System Kit
Reviews.Author: Joshua Diller
Reviews.Content: Good Buy just what i was expecting and did not cost as much as going to a store and buying it.

Reviews.Title: Loud!
Reviews.Author: zmom13
Reviews.Content: First let me say these alarms are very loud, I didn't know at the time when I ordered them that they come with batteries ...well the smaller ones do, the larger on for your front door doesn't. They seem like they'd get the job done and I am very with what I got

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind is worth having...
Reviews.Author: Ronnie
Reviews.Content: Follow the instructions and your good to go. I liked that it was three to use at different locations. It a reasonable way to add to your peace of mind for safety or just to be alerted when you need to be.  Read info before buying. Make sure it covers the need you have? Amazon had a great price. I went to local home stores and prices was more than I wanted. It worked for me at Amazon

Reviews.Title: LOUD AND ALARMING
Reviews.Author: Sherry Doan
Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT IS DEFINITELY A LOUD SYSTEM AND IT WORKS!!!!!!  IF A PERSON BREAKS IN THEY WOULD GO DEAF BEFORE THEY FIGURED OUT HOW TO TURN IT OFF,  AND RUN .  A GREAT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Great price, very helpful!
Reviews.Author: Valerie Taylor
Reviews.Content: I live in a somewhat ghetto area and was robbed a couple months ago. I got this thing and it's definitely a help. It's REEALLYY loud which is great. No, it doesn't call the cops, but it sure will startle ANYONE. Very easy to install - just put it on a windowstill or a door and choose the setting (alarm, chime -chimes when it opens-, off) and lock em up!

Reviews.Title: Good System For Apartment
Reviews.Author: G-Ma
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, and operate.  Great for an apartment or rental unit.  Alarm is loud and would scare anyone away.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Terry A. Fowler
Reviews.Content: i bought this for another daughter- she loves the way it works and wow! the price was great good service

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: JESUS MEDINA G
Reviews.Content: muy buen servico, sin ningun inconveniente, el despacho a tiempo y el producto de muy buena calidad, sin ninguna observacion

Reviews.Title: The Best Home Security System Ever
Reviews.Author: Boca Chula
Reviews.Content: This Alarm is the best security system I ever bought. This system it's VERY LOUD. I'm very impressed with it. I recommend it to everyone, specially if u have children. I will buy it again.

Reviews.Title: is a good product
Reviews.Author: Danny Javier
Reviews.Content: It is a good product for me, does the job I need, even more'll ask 2 kit.What I do not like is that the sensors if the windows are closed stop ringing.

Reviews.Title: Cool Gadget!
Reviews.Author: MatthewTX
Reviews.Content: So easy to install and use. It's very loud and makes me feel a bit safer! Although I will eventually use screws to mount it as the sticky tape won't last forever and I worry a few months from now the alarm will blare off at night but not because an intruder is coming in but because the alarm fell off the sticky tape! Great-affordable-"protection!"

Reviews.Title: They are supper loud
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Fillmore
Reviews.Content: I have used these for some time now and they work great. I have them in my sons room on his window so if he opens it or so one else opens it I will hear it from acrossed the room.

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Bigcat
Reviews.Content: I have used two of the large door alarms for 2 months now and I am now sleeping much better knowing I will be alerted to any intrusion into my mobile home. I purchased a single door alarm separatly for my second door. The alarms are much louder than I expected and will instantly wake me from a heavy sleep. I would reccomend using the screws to install the alarms as the stick ons could come loose and the alarm falls off and alarm sounds when this happens. The window alarms are not as loud as the door alarms but still work well. Again, the alarms exceeded my expectation.

Reviews.Title: A Simple Tool For Any Security Measure
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: The Smart House Wireless Alarm System Kit gives you everything you need in an alarm system. The item is easy to install and it comes a variety of tools such as having an array of alarms and a simple key system that can easily be installed. Oppose to the likes of Fortress GSM G5 Wireless Home Alarm System with iPhone/Android App & RFID TechnologyA, this security system works for any home thanks to its simplicity.

Reviews.Title: cheap/functional alarm
Reviews.Author: vtsnow
Reviews.Content: Appears to be a reasonably priced simple noise amer alarm. Won't stop a pro but should deter the average juvy delinquent.

Reviews.Title: Loud! Does what it's supposed to do, easy to use, love the chime feature.
Reviews.Author: db
Reviews.Content: Good quality, quick installation, performs as advertised, easy to use.  The key pad is handy and we love the door chime feature.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: aurszenyi
Reviews.Content: Got this product due to the neighborhood I live in. Since I don't have 100's of dollars for an alarm system spending $20 isn't bad. It has two different alarm types and also a keypad for the large alarm with a home/away setting....it works great no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Alarm System
Reviews.Author: RobArwine
Reviews.Content: this item is great for apartment living and i highly recomend this product, front door alarm is ear pearcing and if you have it at ear level you will hear ringing for a couple of days, window alarms arent bad either there perfect for a one story apartment as i would hear them out of a dead sleep.wich is why i bought this product, my toddler can now open doors and the door chime feature is perfect and u can set all of the alarms to chime if thats what u need then easily flip a button to alarm great product

Reviews.Title: LOUD and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Raven "Raven"
Reviews.Content: All of the alarms are very loud, the one for the door is so loud, you may want to use earplugs and keep kids away until you learn how to set it. I love it! My neighbors and people on the street can hear it and a burglar would think it was a real alarm and run. It's easy to use, just program a code you and your family can remember easily. Before you leave, put in your code and shut the door. when you return and open the door it will go off and you just punch  in your code. We have had a lot of burglaries here during the holidays in my hood, 10 in 2 days before Christmas, so that's why I ordered this. I also have bought stickers to put on the windows and the fake or dummy surveillance cameras as well as glass break alarms for the front door and sliding glass door. All of this I got on Amazon at cheap prices. If you are like me and can't afford a real system, this is the next best thing and much cheaper. The cops even think I've done well with all my burglar deterrents!

Reviews.Title: works well, hard to get the large door unit to stay in place.  The unit by the door keeps falling off the wall when the door is
Reviews.Author: Barbara Plunkett
Reviews.Content: hard to get the large door unit to stay in place.  The unit by the door keeps falling off the wall when the door is used.  Don't want to screw into wall.

Reviews.Title: HOME ALARM
Reviews.Author: Shari J Wells "Shari Janson"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't buy much better for the money!  Small and easy to install, this alarm is excellent for seniors and anyone with difficulty using hands.  It is quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Safety Kit
Reviews.Author: M. Ocasio
Reviews.Content: The window alarms and door alarm are very loud.  Just moved into a small apartment and wanted a little extra security.  Easy to install and will wake close neighbors up if alarm goes off.  I've set it off a couple of times and it has scared me with the piercing alarm.  I am very happy with this product!

Reviews.Title: Feeling a litler safer
Reviews.Author: Feeling Better
Reviews.Content: I love the big door alarm. The smaller window alarms arent that loud but if someone was trying to break in I feel it would deter them while you reach for your gun or phone to call the police.  I have a poodle so thats an alrm system in itself....so he usually hears things first.  The bigger alarm is great!! If someone was to break thru my doo it would go off and by the time they get up the stairs...Ill be gone!!! LOL..I am a single 48 year women and I am never easy at night. I had a real alarm system, but face it by the time the cops get there I could have called them myself.  I love this product. I think Im going to buy another Door alarm....very loud and shocking.

Reviews.Title: Gregg L. Friedman MD Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL
Reviews.Author: Julie L. Friedman
Reviews.Content: The GE 51107 Smart Home Wireless Alarm System Kit provides an excellent burglar alarm system for your home at a low price. It is very easy to set up and install this system and it works well. The instructions were very easy to follow. I give the GE  Burglar Alarm system 5 Stars. By Gregg L. Friedman MD, Psychiatrist, Hallandale Beach, FL

Reviews.Title: Wireless alarm
Reviews.Author: Traveler210 "Traveler210"
Reviews.Content: Seems to be doing what it should.  Loud enough for me to hear on the other side of my home.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: Window sensors work wonderfully. I didn't use the sticky pads that came with the switches, and instead opted to use my own velcro stickers. Stayed on so far and works fine. It's loud enough to startle someone, but I doubt it will alert my neighbors or anything like that.The door sensor was hard to configure and setup correctly. I setup the code according to the instructions, but it doesn't seem to always activate when the door opens. It's more useful as a chime I think.

Reviews.Title: Not much use.
Reviews.Author: B. Barrett
Reviews.Content: The door alarm is too loud on chime and the alarm setting did not function correctly, so have opted not to use that setting. The alarm was accidently set off and the code did not work to turn the alarm off.I had to find earplugs and then unscrew the battery doors to remove the batteries in order to get the alarm off.Subsequently have purchased a monitored alarm system.If the code had worked to turn off the alarm, it would be acceptable. Really, the fact that the code didn't work is ridiculously unacceptable. In retrospect, I should have returned this item. It did not work as it should. The alarm is deafening. The chime setting is also annoyingly loud.However, made me think that if I were a burglar, I would just wear earplugs.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Bethany Fant
Reviews.Content: This product works great and was a great fit for us, as we did not want to have to pay the $100+ a month bill.

Reviews.Title: Ge product
Reviews.Author: george delgado g Delgado
Reviews.Content: Great product, does everything as promised. Installed easy. Feel a lot more secured than before. Would recommend to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Time Delay Too Long
Reviews.Author: Carmen Mami "Drum Nut"
Reviews.Content: The time delay for the Alarm to go off if a break-in happens is way too long. My house was broken into before having this product and the Police said the robber was in the house maybe 2 to 3 minutes. A smash and grab looking for jewelry or gold. The Alarm will not trigger for 30 seconds which means the robber has already been tearing things up and looking for stuff. Try it yourself, fake a break in and then dash to a bedroom grab a jewelry box and head out the door. Doesn't take much time and the Alarm has not done its job.  The alarm sound itself is loud and the high pitch is disorientating so if you do buy this wear hearing protection while testing.  The window alarms go off immediately when signal is broken and will shut off when window is closed.  They have an off, chime, and alarm setting. It may not be a bad idea to use the small window alarm for the door. It will go off as you leave but will stop once you close the door.  Other than the long wait for the alarm to go off the screws to hold the bracket are very cheap and if you do not drill a screw hole for the screws there is a good chance you will strip the head and will not be able to remove the screw or screw it in completely.

Reviews.Title: overall a good product
Reviews.Author: Mr. Do it All
Reviews.Content: i like the window units a lot. the keypad unit is not a motion sensor but rather a magnet contact type like the window alarms. i would have prefered the keypad to be a motion sensing alarm so that it can be placed in my hallway and not be limited to being installed on the door or door post.sound is not soft but not too loud either. its loud enough to work as a deterent and to alert home owners. over all this is a pretty good value and should be used as an additional layer of security to other security elements like locks etc.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dbryjen
Reviews.Content: The smaller window alarms work fine, but it is hard to tell when the door alarms are armed and when they are not. It would be helpful if they had a certain colored light to show when they were armed and another color to show when they were not. I ended up taking the door alarms off and just putting the window alarms on the doors. They seem to be working fine, so guess I'll keep them. My advice.... just purchase the smaller window alarms.

Reviews.Title: pleased with product
Reviews.Author: Hal
Reviews.Content: The burglar alarm system works well. For the money I am well pleased. Put on door of garage. Very loud. It serves my needs in garage.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: tm91
Reviews.Content: This is a good product if you want something simple and basic. Alarm is loud. The chime is a bit too loud for everyday use. You will need a mini-screwdriver to get the back open with. All in all, I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ayana
Reviews.Content: Great, and easy to use system for the money. Instillation was simple and the alarm is very loud, for such a small product.

Reviews.Title: Overall not bad for the price, but cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Adam Carpenter "Adam C"
Reviews.Content: I owned one of these for 6 months then bumped the door chime one day leaving the house and the door mount broke. The tiny plastic pins on the door mount are brittle and easily broken - and GE doesnt have parts to replace. I attempted to glue several times without luck, so if you purchase one be very careful not to break the mounts or you'll need to buy an entirely new system since the mounts are made in China and not sold separately even as a replacement part.I will not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Tom Moore
Reviews.Content: The shipper shipped the product in a timely manner and the product works. This one can be set to alarm or chime mode. Works great!  I'd recommend it to anyone that doesn't have an alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Wireless system's simplicity makes it a standout
Reviews.Author: Sonny Moloka'i
Reviews.Content: The installation/setup with this system is a snap. Simple operation, but it does exactly what it needs to do, even though it isn't a more sophisticated, monitored alarm.

Reviews.Title: easy and simple
Reviews.Author: Benz
Reviews.Content: This is a good item to have. It is easy and simple. Sometimes it is hard to find a place to locate the items because it has to fixed at certain direction.

Reviews.Title: Works great...but LOUD!
Reviews.Author: LaurenG
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my 2 year old kept trying to sneak out of our house and it worked really well. The noise is LOUD - even when it's not on the alarm setting and definitely lets you know when the door is opened. My daughter's bedroom is directly above our front door, and she is a light sleeper so my husband had to start turning it off when he left for work in the morning and I would turn it on when we woke up. It was also really easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy
Reviews.Author: Alex Kruk
Reviews.Content: So it says that the main device and its particular sensor device has to be at most 1/2 inch away. I set mine up so it was even less than 1/4 of an inch away. Didn't even register that it was there. no chime, no alarm. Only when I took device and held them on top of each other it worked.  NOT WORTH THE HEADACHE

Reviews.Title: Poor design
Reviews.Author: Satyamvad
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product based on good reviews on the website. The installation was quick and easy. The alarm and chime works as expected, however, after one month of installation, the GE 45117 alarm system does not stay in position. The self adhesive pad can not hold the unit. On detailed inspection, I found a plastic pad on the back that keep the body of the alarm raised from the door, leaving the adhesive pad only a point contact. It falls on floor everyday now triggering either alarm or chime based on settings.

Reviews.Title: must have.....
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Living on my own as a single woman, I love this item it gives me comfort that now I'm protected when I'm home and away from home, next on my list is to get some of those stickers that my place is armed what not... I live in an upstairs apt so I'm not too worried about my windows as much, I used 1 of the window pieces to place on my back door and I love it!!! If your a single person and feel you need a little feeling of comfort when home and away from home this is a good item to have, tho it doesn't alert you if some1 has entered your place, its great I have an amazing neighbor she knows if the alarm goes off for a few mins or so that its not me to call the police, so if that were to happen she'd call me at work to inform she had to call the police and go from there, which I'm hoping that doesn't ever happen.. To any1 who may purchase this I hope they get the comfort I got from getting this item.... Enjoy if you do get this item.

Reviews.Title: Really NOISY!
Reviews.Author: Talky
Reviews.Content: It is cheap and useful, though it rings truly LOUDLY!I like the window alarm more than the door one.BTW, you need to buy batteries for the door alarm.

Reviews.Title: Loud and Life Saving
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: My 5-year-old has either developed a sleep-walking problem and/or a severe wandering problem. We installed one of these alarms on his door in order to stop him from wandering into certain parts of the house that are dangerous when poorly lit at night. It also keeps him from wandering right out the door. Also, when the alarm does sound, it wakes him up and also wakes up my wife and I. So we are all alerted to the situation. Nice little product and much cheaper than wiring an entire home security system.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for the Price
Reviews.Author: K. A. Jordan Hane
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if I received a defective kit, but I didn't find the alarm to be all that loud.  For $20 it isn't bad for how I intend to use it.  I live in an apartment, and it will provide me with some warning to reach for my weapon and/or phone if someone attempts to enter the window. I have it set to alarm, and it would hardly awaken the neighbors as previous reviews have stated.

Reviews.Title: fairly good one
Reviews.Author: phil
Reviews.Content: I don't think that one will stop breaking in, however the alarm on the door will definitely scare the crap out of the thief.But the alarm on the window looks more like a decoration than actual alarm since the sound is so tiny that if you are in another room, you can not sense it at all.Anyway, for that price, it is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Simple system that makes you feel safe
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I like this little security system a lot. I put the door unit on the front door and one of the window units on my backyard door. Both work great and are loud enough to at least give the thief a second thought. It gives me a piece of mind and that's all i wanted.

Reviews.Title: GE Alarm System
Reviews.Author: cMonMan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this alarm system to use on basement windows that never get opened and on a sliding glass door. They are very simple to install and I find that the alarms are very loud for their size. I've had mine hooked up for several months now and couldn't be happier.I don't use the door alarm, though. It's not because I don't want to but I think the keypad setup is way too difficult to mess with. Not to mention that someone wanting to enter your house would merely have to peel off both the keypad and the magnet at the same time for it not to sound the alarm. Perhaps its designed to go inside your house on the door, but then there's no way to disarm it before entering.Nevertheless the little ones are great - and it's at a good price too.

Reviews.Title: GE Security system
Reviews.Author: Djace
Reviews.Content: This is a great little system for the price. I primarily wanted the alarm for my basement and sunroom until I can figure out which monitoring system I want to install.

Reviews.Title: Only for use in USA
Reviews.Author: gus26
Reviews.Content: This is very good security,I have ordered the same product before,but the last order was stopped at the customin Iceland where I live,and they say that this product needs CE veryfied for Eourope.I contacted the the jasaonproducts that make these alarms,and they say this is only for USA and neighborhood.I wold like to get comment from the sellerhow we can solve this problem.If somebody out there can tell me about similar product with CE veryfication I would be very gladBest regards Gunnar Overby Icelandand I give this product 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Yipes!!
Reviews.Author: Ottermane
Reviews.Content: I installed the first half of my new security system over the weekend and my goodness does it work!  I've accidentally set it off twice so far.  You get a lot of noise out of three AAA batteries.  Installation on metal doors is problematic--the stickyback tape doesn't want to hold--and the screw in the battery door can't stand up to a screwdriver, but aside from that all is well.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Mark B
Reviews.Content: This item was terrible. The window alarms are rather useless as they either make a very loud chiming sound or a mediocre volume alarm. Their main flaw is that the intruder can immediately silence the alarm by either breaking this small device or TURNING A SWITCH. There is no passcode for the window units. The door unit is even worse. The device doesn't want to accept the passcode sometimes. Sometimes it simply flashes a red light when the door is opened, even though the alarm is on "home" mode (which means the alarm should immediately sound when the door is opened). All of this basically means that I do not trust the alarm and I am so annoyed with it, I am sure I will not use it. I cannot even return the thing since it comes in one of those plastic molded containers that force you to mutilate the package to get to the product. Thanks amazon!

Reviews.Title: This is a piece of crap
Reviews.Author: LeBrown
Reviews.Content: I bought this package hoping it would work so I wouldn't have to spend money on a monthly home security system like ADT and Brinks. I can say that the window alarms are very usefull but the door alarm is not. The door alarm after 3 months went out and you have to purchase another because there is no warranty on them.

Reviews.Title: Only chime works
Reviews.Author: K. clark
Reviews.Content: After attaching the alarm to the door, I tried it several times on the chime setting.  Works fine.  But when I set it to alarm, nothing happens.  Set it to AWAY, nothing.  Set it to HOME, nothing.  I put in the code and the light blinks 3 times,  then  nothing.  Switched it back to chime,  works fine.I didn't pay for a door chime, I paid for an alarm.

Reviews.Title: Did not like
Reviews.Author: U. Sharma "US"
Reviews.Content: They work fine but keep falling off from the doors.  Adhesive is poor .  Cannot return a I have lost the original package.

Reviews.Title: holy
Reviews.Author: jenjenison
Reviews.Content: the actual alarm part of it is UNBELIEVABLY loud.  like so loud that your ears are ringing for minutes after you get it off.  originally bought as added protecting in our apartment - after realizing that maintenance wouldn't be able to get in without setting it off, took it off the door and took the batteries out fearing it would go off in the closet.  one day when we have a house it will work well (no maintenence guys) but until then it will be in storage.  the window ones we use on the doors when we're away for long periods of times.  still loud but not like the alarm one.

Reviews.Title: GE deluxe door alarm
Reviews.Author: syed
Reviews.Content: i got my GE alarm kit 51107in away mode or home mode the alarm beep once ?it suppose to beep alarm continues till i enter 4 digit code ??GE 51107 Smart Home Wireless Alarm System Kit

Reviews.Title: Fits the bill.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: These are a good value.  If you're home, any of them should wake you up if someone breaks in so you can get your weapon of choice before they get to you.  If you're away you may want more door units for all entry doors because they stay on.  The window units are "stand alone" (i.e. they don't wirelessly tell the door unit to stay on so the burglar can just turn their switch off.  You need the code to turn off a door unit.

Reviews.Title: Works ok, can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Random411
Reviews.Content: Needed to install in an older building that was made of old wood. Not easy with a product only made to stick to smooth surfaces. Had to create my own smooth surface to stick them too. Other than that they work as advertised.Also it advertised 120 db alarm. The bigger keypad unit yes, The smaller alarms are not as loud, my guess would be 90 db each for those.All in all, a good value for what what is cost.

Reviews.Title: alarm
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I like that its small and really loud. Its cheep and worth it . It's easy to use and it blends in to the window.

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: jesus lopez
Reviews.Content: poor quality, the main alarm is not working, burning money.only work the alarm window.The main alarm is impossible to use.

Reviews.Title: Effective
Reviews.Author: Shua Jables
Reviews.Content: I bought this kit for the 1,100 sqft house I rent. I like this system because its not too permanent, and its very easy to hear from anywhere.Window Installation:Window installation was a breeze after a bit of thinking. I couldn't mount them in the typical way because of the molding. However, I was able to very easily mount them on the bottom of the window on the window ledge. I mounted the magnet on the window putting the tape on the side of the magnet (not the back) and mounted the alarm on the window sill with the tape on the back like normal.Door Installation:Had to use a spacer (foarm board) to get the door alarm far enough out to reach the magnet mounted on the molding. The manufacturer does include a kind of mounting gadget that brings it off the door slightly so maybe they could also include a larger one that extends the device farther out. But they can't reasonable include all possible mounting hardware to work with all possible door designs so I don't fault them for that. If you're basically installing a $23 home alarm system yourself, you probably have a little bit of ingenuity and can make it work.To those whose house is too large to hear all the window alarms: If your house is that big, you should probably spend more than $23 on a home alarm system. Like a full featured home security system.I don't mind the deactivation switches on the window alarms. I figure it would take at least 3-5 seconds for a bandit to figure it out which should be enough to get your attention no matter what you are doing. It may not wake your neighbors if you aren't home but it is just stuff that can be replaced, mostly (renter's insurance is a beautiful thing). I'd rather know if someone is in my home while I'm home also in case the burglar is of the dangerous/armed variety. For example, I sleep with earplugs so typical noises don't wake me up, but these alarms sure would.I like this kit but only bought one to make sure I liked it and could install it relatively easily. As such I purchased 2 more to finish the job.

Reviews.Title: Poor Design
Reviews.Author: John B.
Reviews.Content: I returned this item due to poor design of the door alarm. I was unable to find any indication of whether or not the system was armed, so there was no way to tell if I would set off the alarm when opening the door. The chime is not too loud, but the shrieking alarm is ear-splitting. There must be better devices out there!

Reviews.Title: door/window alarms
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: A very economically cheap solution to making sure no one can enter your home after you have gone to sleep. Alarms are piercingly loud to scare off any intruder.

Reviews.Title: GE 51107 Alarm System
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: The GE 51107 Smart Home Wireless Alarm System Kit is a great buy. This alarm system is economical and easy to install.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Loud as hell
Reviews.Author: Mark Wagner "MW"
Reviews.Content: The main alarm all I have to say is loud as hell (scare you to where you'd pee yourself if you didnt know it was coming) The one thing I kind of dont like is that the alarm is delays about 30 sec and it gives a little chirp when tripped. 30 sec is enough time to break it before it goes off if you were to notice it ( as the thief ) but other then that its not bad and super loud

Reviews.Title: Be Ware: Defective Product
Reviews.Author: K. JUN
Reviews.Content: The window alarms worked fine, but the 'Alarm' mode on the door alarm did not work at all -- very disappointed. Returning this junk is not worth the hassle, so I'm going to eat this loss.  In retrospect, I should've just bought it from Home Depot so I could run back and return it with no hassle. First bad Amazon experience in many years.  I suppose there's a first for everything.

Reviews.Title: cant tell if it is armed.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Brooks
Reviews.Content: It has red and green leds... but doesnt use anytying to tell u by looking at it if it is armed or not.  Also cant change it from home setting to away setting without entering your code twice...

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!
Reviews.Author: leebo "World Affairs Junkie"
Reviews.Content: I must say, being a cautious buyer when I am venturing into a type of product Ive never owned, it took me a while to decide to purchase this. Now to be honest, I'm glad I did. This alarm system is darn good for the cheap price. I live in a somewhat shady area (saving to buy a house), and needed something for a little security. It comes with one big main door alarm and magnet, and 3 smaller ones for windows and/or doors in the house (not as loud as the main one, but a about half as loud to scare off someone).First I must say, and after reading the other reviews I must agree, the larger alarm component which is meant for the door is shockingly LOUD! And I mean so much that you can feel your eardrums throbbing. It even warns you in the manual that prolonged exposure can cause deafness! (seriously)I am like the reviewer that wanted a quick, cheap, but effective alarm system to scare off an intruder in lieu of nothing. I think this will do the trick. Activation is a cinch, and pretty user friendly.PROS:CheapLOUDDependable (except once, it went off when I walked in, scared the crap out of me)Makes me feel safer at nightCONS:(after being armed) I would really love to see an adjustable timer for alarm set-off so that when you open your door, a robber doesnt have 30 seconds to snatch and grab stuff. A little beep emits when the door is open, but u cant tell an alarm is about to go off.The main door alarm is too loud for me to set at night. If it went off at night while I was sleeping, it would seriously give me a heart attack. Needs a volume control.

Reviews.Title: It'll work but dont expect too much
Reviews.Author: Petes
Reviews.Content: This product is a good deal if you want something. The system is not too fancy. If you hope that the noise will ward off intruders and notify neighbors, it will do that. Wondering whether the adhesive will damage the paint on the door sills. You might not like the design, they may take away from the appearance of your place.

Reviews.Title: Worked Well
Reviews.Author: Rocky Mountain
Reviews.Content: Not too expensive yet lets me know everytime one of my kids try to open the doors.  Plenty loud, I call here it when I'm in the basement.  Simple to setup as well.

Reviews.Title: we bought foscam instead.
Reviews.Author: guinness
Reviews.Content: alarm is so loud and was giving me too much anxiety!  I hated turning it on because I was so scared all the time that I wouldn't be fast enough to turn it off.  My dog is scared of loud beeps so I was so anxious all the time.  We ended up returning it because I didn't want to live like that!!!!  We ended up getting a foscam from amazon which has been so great.  Easy set up and sends you email of images when there is movement.  We turn it on when we leave and turn it off when we are home.  We also bought the kwikset smart key electronic deadbolt as well which has been fun and convenient not having to take the keys with us everywhere we go. I would skip out on this alarm.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON's Smart Home Wireless Alarm Review
Reviews.Author: Mo'Ney
Reviews.Content: This door alarm literally uses 3 batteries every 4 hours- so there's obviously some issue.  It's pretty hard to put the alarm less than 1/2 inch apart (considering the door is that far from the moulding.  Can't screw the alarm into my door (It's not wood) and the strip lost it's stickiness after the 1st time I had to take it down (4 hours later) to replace the batteries.  The 1st batteries onkky lasted minutes; tried 3 different brands.

Reviews.Title: Alarm doesn't sound with metal door frames
Reviews.Author: Seth Wandersman
Reviews.Content: I have not been able to make the alarm go off.I made it learn the access code. It will start or stop flashing when I key it in. But if set the alarm flashing and leave the door open for a minute it never goes off.I did get it to work in chime mode once on the kitchen table but it has never worked on the door. Hopefully metal in the door frame doesn't cause it to not work.I called their tech support and they suggested it was broken. If I return and get a new one I'll update.If you are setting one up and using the tape to affix to the wall I recommend not using the tape until you verify it works.UPdate: Further testing on kitchen table does seem to indicate door frame is problem.

Reviews.Author: cer1

Most of the time I use the chime function to let me know when the door is opened.  Chime can be heard across the entire floor of the house, but not upstairs.  The door is also wired into my home security system, but since this door opens to a swimming pool, our county ordinance required a separate audible alarm.  This one works nicely.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Door Alarms for Pool Safety
Reviews.Author: PJStewart
Reviews.Content: I ordered this alarm system for swimming pool safety, not as a home security device.  I leave the system on chime at all times on four sliding doors that exit to a pool area. The batteries in the main unit on my busiest door that is opened multiple times per day lasted about 2.5 months.  The chime is loud enough to hear at all ends of my 3200 sq. ft. home. The regular security alarm is quite piercing and would deter/turn around an unsuspecting or unsophisticated intruder. However it will not serve as an alert to neighbors without common walls, or passersby on the street.  For the price I got far more than I expected and ordered a second kit. If you want a high end system, pay for it....but for an interior alert or pool safety warning system, this is working great for me and my family.

Reviews.Title: Woke up to it going out at 4:30 in the morning!
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: This is my first product review on anything, ever. I woke up last night at 4:30 in the morning to the sound of the back door alarm going off and my girlfriend freaking out. Half asleep I reached for my shotgun. With the mix of complete drowsiness, anxiety and adrenaline, I made my way out the bedroom and down our stairs (shotgun in hand). Our stairs are L shaped with a wall about half the way to the top. So I could be walking into a gunshot before I even see anyone. I make it about halfway down and realize this could be the end of mine or another persons life. Once I have a visual of the kitchen to which I am walking in, I see no one. I then approach the back door, which has the alarm and get ready for what's next To my complete pleasure the alarm has just become loose and was at a 45* tilt which made the alarm go off. Thank god. I gave the review 3 stars because if this was an actual brake in, I would at lease have time to defend myself.

How can they advertise 150 feet!?  It was NOT EVEN CLOSE!!!  My bike has had its license plate stolen recently, and it's in my car port not even 50 feet away from my kitchen, and the control center device doesn't work when I go out and purposely trigger the motion sensor.  Next, I try move it outdoors onto the deck, walk across my small yard, wave at the motion sensor, and still nothing but a red flicker, indicating the motion sensor sees me.I then take the control center with me -in hand- and go trigger the motion sensor.  Aaaah, THERE it is, the alarm finally goes off.This thing is PATHETIC.  Do NOT buy this unless you need it for only a VERY short range.Do NOT buy this.

Reviews.Title: Potential Hearing Loss
Reviews.Author: terry cloth
Reviews.Content: My landlord removed the ADT system and installed this GE system after I signed the lease. While I understand wanting to save money, the 120DB sound can cause potential hearing loss and after having the thing go off twice, my left ear is hurting and one of my pets is traumatized. Whether hearing has been affected remains to be seen. I can't imagine anyone with children or pets wanting this device in their home. If it goes off while you're not there, it seems to me that it could kill your pet with their sensitive hearing.  If an intruder comes into your home, he/she will certainly regret it, and so will you. The warning about hearing loss is in very small print and not even noticeable unless you read the entire little booklet. I would never recommend this product since no one knows for certain how the "alarm" setting would affect his/her health until it's too late. I uninstalled it for fear of it accidentially going off again and will hope for the best.

Reviews.Title: No consumer help
Reviews.Author: Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the GE simon XT security system and installed it myself. I am a licensed master electrician and although I do not install security systems for a living, I am technically inclined. I followed the instructions closely and the system works very well with a few glitches in the programing. The Motion sensors should only activate when they are manually activated when going to bed at night. This should be separate from the doors and windows. If you get up in the middle of the night to get a drink of water the alarm goes off. Also, there should be a delay so that when the motion sensors are activated, you have time to deactivate them prior to the alarm siren. Getting up in the morning I don't have enough time to get across the kitchen to deactivate the system before the siren goes off and I get my ears blasted. I know that the system can be adjusted to eliminate this problem but I cannot get help from GE. When I call their tech support it will not give me a live person to talk with and if you tell it you are a home owner it says to call your professional installer and then hangs up on you. I sent three emails to GE tech support and they never responded. All I need to do is get a simple verbal instruction to set the program since this is not addressed in the instructions. GE simply turns their back on you once they sell you a product. This is not the first time this has happened to me with a GE product. Also, all of the literature with the Simon XT wireless system says that you can use it with  alight module to turn your lights on and off remotely or with the control panel. This cannot be done. Apparently, according to the company that supplies the light modules, GE printed their literature prematurely and after production they found that the modules would not work with the transformer supplied with the system. GE went ahead and sold it anyway and just tells everyone that bought it that it doesn't work and they're just out of luck. Too bad, so sad. Shame on you GE!!! I have disconnected my $500.00 system because it doesn't work properly and I cannot get any technical support for simple programing help.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Term is Misleading - Not Interconnected
Reviews.Author: G. Cox "Shanghaied"
Reviews.Content: The term wirless implies that the three units are interconnected via transmission signals.  They are simply individual battery operated alarms. This is misleading in my opinion.  I should have paid extra for a true interconnected wireless system.  Meanwhile, I will stick them on my two windows and the door.Currently there are 19 one star reviews and 19 two star reviews.  I was one of the earliest reviewers, so I feel vindicated with my opinion of this product. I've found that anytime a person gives a negative review, there are a lot of people who vote that my reviews are not useful. I don't understand this mentality. I gave my opinion.  You don't have to agree with me, but you can just kindly move on and not blemish my review history with a negative vote.
